content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2(4), Barcelona 2(2).
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Barcelona 2.
Ramires (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rafinha (Barcelona).
Alen Halilovic (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nathaniel Chalobah (Chelsea).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Thomas Vermaelen (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Victor Moses (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Nathaniel Chalobah replaces Gary Cahill because of an injury.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Barcelona 2. Gary Cahill (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Ramires (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Rafinha (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Foul by Victor Moses (Chelsea).
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Gary Cahill.
Attempt blocked. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Foul by Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea).
Pedro (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Ramires (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Victor Moses.
Attempt missed. Falcao (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Loïc Remy with a cross.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Jordi Alba (Barcelona).
Victor Moses (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Barcelona. Alen Halilovic replaces Munir El Haddadi.
Foul by Sergi Samper (Barcelona).
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Rafinha (Barcelona).
Loïc Remy (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kurt Zouma (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Falcao replaces Eden Hazard.
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona).
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Barcelona 2. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Rafinha.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Victor Moses.
Attempt blocked. Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergi Samper.
Substitution, Chelsea. Victor Moses replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Substitution, Chelsea. John Terry replaces César Azpilicueta.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pedro replaces Luis Suárez.
Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Thomas Vermaelen (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Samper replaces Sergio Busquets.
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafinha replaces Gerard Gumbau.
Substitution, Chelsea. John Obi Mikel replaces Nemanja Matic.
Substitution, Chelsea. Loïc Remy replaces Diego Costa.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jordi Masip replaces Marc-André ter Stegen.
Substitution, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta replaces Ivan Rakitic.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jordi Alba replaces Adriano.
Substitution, Barcelona. Thomas Vermaelen replaces Jeremy Mathieu.
Substitution, Barcelona. Gerard Piqué replaces Marc Bartra.
Attempt missed. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Attempt blocked. Adriano (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Sandro Ramírez.
Attempt blocked. Gerard Gumbau (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Munir El Haddadi.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).
Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Barcelona 1. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Eden Hazard.
Foul by Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona).
César Azpilicueta (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Diego Costa (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Substitution, Chelsea. Ramires replaces Oscar.
Second Half begins Chelsea 1, Barcelona 0.
Substitution, Chelsea. Willian replaces Kenedy.
First Half ends, Chelsea 1, Barcelona 0.
Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona).
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt blocked. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Offside, Chelsea. Diego Costa tries a through ball, but Eden Hazard is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sergi Roberto with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Diego Costa (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt saved. Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Sergio Busquets.
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Munir El Haddadi.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona).
Foul by Kenedy (Chelsea).
Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Gerard Gumbau.
Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona).
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt blocked. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Sandro Ramírez.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto replaces Douglas.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by César Azpilicueta.
Attempt blocked. Marc Bartra (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Kurt Zouma.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Thibaut Courtois.
Attempt saved. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Barcelona 0. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kurt Zouma.
Attempt saved. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Diego Costa.
Foul by César Azpilicueta (Chelsea).
Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Offside, Chelsea. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Nemanja Matic is caught offside.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Marc Bartra (Barcelona).
Gerard Gumbau (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oscar (Chelsea).
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Marc-André ter Stegen.
Attempt saved. Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) header from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross.
Kenedy (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Gerard Gumbau (Barcelona).
First Half begins.
Penalty Shootout ends, Chelsea 2(4), Barcelona 2(2).
Goal!  Chelsea 2(4), Barcelona 2(2). Loïc Remy (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Chelsea 2(3), Barcelona 2(2). Sandro Ramírez (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Chelsea 2(3), Barcelona 2(1). Ramires (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty saved! Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Chelsea 2(2), Barcelona 2(1). Victor Moses (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty missed! Still  Chelsea 2(1), Barcelona 2(1). Alen Halilovic (Barcelona) hits the bar with a left footed shot.
Goal!  Chelsea 2(1), Barcelona 2(1). Falcao (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Barcelona 2(1). Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty Shootout begins Chelsea 2, Barcelona 2.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
